entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning after midnight. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 15 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to 15 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
